message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 represents fair value, I'm willing to come down to $110. I'm confident you won't find a better deal on this.
I understand your confidence in the product's value, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
